extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">btf, tf8, tiff, tif, gtiff</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: BigTIFF
description: A variant TIFF format, BigTIFF  transcends TIFF's 4 GB TIFF limit using 64-bit offsets thereby supporting files up to 18,000 petabytes in size.
